title: OpenAI takes stake in Thrive Holdings in latest enterprise AI push
description: CHATGPT-MAKER OpenAI has taken a stake in Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.
content:
CHATGPT-MAKER OpenAI has taken a stake in Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.

title: Apple AI chief leaving as iPhone maker plays catch-up
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Apple on Monday said the head of its artificial intelligence team is stepping down, and the effort is to be led by a veteran engineer from Google and Microsoft.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO, California — Apple on Monday said the head of its artificial intelligence team is stepping down, and the effort is to be led by a veteran engineer from Google and Microsoft.

title: Chinese tech giants rush to capture emerging smart glasses market
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) glasses have emerged as one of the most popular devices at tech and trade fairs over the past year. Several exhibitors said visitors are increasingly willing to stop, try on different models, and ask about specific functions ― a shift that signals consumer interest moving from novelty to practicality.

title: Amazon to use Nvidia tech in AI chips, roll out new servers
description: LAS VEGAS, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Amazon.com's AWS cloud computing unit on Tuesday said it will adopt key Nvidia technology in future generations of its artificial intelligence computing chips as the firm ramps up efforts to get major AI customers using its services.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman declares 'code red' to improve ChatGPT amid rising competition in AI chatbots
description: The newspaper reported that Altman sent an internal memo to staff Monday saying more work was needed to enhance the artificial intelligence chatbots speed, reliability and personalisation features.This week marks three years since OpenAI first released ChatGPT, helping to spark global fascination and a commercial boom in generative AI technology.
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has set off a "code red" alert to employees to improve its flagship product, ChatGPT, and delay other product developments, according to The Wall Street Journal. The newspaper reported that Altman sent an internal memo to staff ... [669 chars]

title: OneOcean weighs in on technology impact on shipping and seafarers
description: THE adoption of digital technologies including artificial intelligence (AI) in shipping is transforming an age-old industry, making it more adaptable, efficient, and sustainable.
content:

title: Amazon to use Nvidia tech in AI chips, roll out new servers
description: Amazon.com's AWS cloud computing unit on Tuesday said it will adopt key Nvidia technology in future generations of its artificial intelligence computing chips as the firm ramps up efforts to get major AI customers using its services.
content: AWS, or Amazon Web Services, said it will adopt a technology called "NVLink Fusion" in a future chip, with no specified release date, known as Trainium4. The NVLink technology creates speedy connections between different kinds of chips and is one of ... [2512 chars]

title: South Korea Parliament Clears 2026 Budget to Power AI-Led Growth
description: South Korea’s parliament approved a 727.9 trillion won ($495.8 billion) budget for next year on Tuesday, endorsing President Lee Jae Myung’s sweeping plan to revive the economy through aggressive investment in artificial intelligence and other strategic sectors.

title: RPS Superintendent Outlines Need for Strong AI Strategy
description: Rochester Public Schools Superintendent Kent Pekel discusses the potential benefits and pitfalls of artificial intelligence in the classrooms.
content:
Rochester, MN (KROC-AM News) - Grappling with the role of AI in classrooms and other facets of education is expected to be addressed in the next strategic plan for the Rochester School District.
